title: Add integration coverage and verify success criteria
description: Add or update automated tests and verification checks to confirm API behavior, UI flows, and success criteria defined in the spec for the initial implementation.
acceptance_criteria: Automated coverage verifies critical API contract behavior for 400/404/409 and summary responses.
Automated or scripted verification covers core UI flows: add expense, filter expenses, and view insights.
Verification confirms success criteria in docs/SPEC.md are met.
Any implementation gaps discovered during verification are documented for follow-up.
